review_data.title: Understated delight
review_data.content: If you are looking for delicious and reasonably priced (for Zürich) Italian food in a lively setting, served by a charming host and his team and offering an outstanding choice of wines, then Sazio is the place for you. A frequent visitor and never disappointed.
